1. Select the check box against the name of the appropriate Test and then click Assign.
  2. In the pop up window, select the Teaching Group or Students that you wish to assign
    3. To assign a whole Group, tick the box next to the name of the Group.
  3. Use the mini Calendars to select a Start and End date for your Test.
    This will specify the time frame for this test to be active on your Students' Kerboodle calendar and Assignment panel for this course.
  4. Click Ok.

Tip! You can add future start dates for assigning work later in the school year.

To view your Students' results you can either launch the markbook from the assignments panel (from here you can add you comment on the students performance); or you can go to the Reports page and view more detailed reports on your students answers.
